meanings.definition: Unpleasantly damp and sticky to the touch.
meanings.sent1: The clamminess of the wet towel made it uncomfortable to hold.
meanings.sent2: The clamminess of the mud made it hard to walk through the field.
meanings.sent3: The clamminess of the jellyfish made it hard to pick up without getting slimy.
meanings.sent4: The clamminess of the room enveloped us like a wet blanket.
meanings.sent5: The clamminess of the fish made it clear it had been out of water for too long.

meanings.definition: A feeling of dampness or stickiness on the skin.
meanings.sent1: After the workout, the clamminess on his forehead showed how hard he had worked.
meanings.sent2: The clamminess on her palms made it difficult to grip the steering wheel.
meanings.sent3: The clamminess on his skin made him feel like a human popsicle.
meanings.sent4: The clamminess of the air clung to her like a second skin.
meanings.sent5: The clamminess of the lotion left a sticky residue on her hands.
